name: Survive the Night (ZRMDSXA)
description:
Defeat the enemies before time runs out. You will need to search around the map for weapons and ammo.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse - Aim

Left click - Shoot

Right click - Zoom

E - Pick up item

R - Reload

G - Grenade

1 - Switch to rifle

2 - Switch to pistol
